## IDefaultMetricsConfig interface

Default prom-client metrics config

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDefaultMetricsConfig extends DefaultMetricsCollectorConfiguration
```

<b>Extends:</b> DefaultMetricsCollectorConfiguration

## Remarks

Extends the [prom-client](https://github.com/siimon/prom-client#default-metrics) interface. So it accepts all options from it and pass to default metrics.

## Properties

| Property                                                       | Modifiers | Type    | Description                                                                                                      |
| -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [enabled?](./fastify-metrics.idefaultmetricsconfig.enabled.md) |           | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Enables collection of default prom-client metrics (e.g. node.js vitals like cpu, memory, etc.) |
